text: The World Draughts Federation (WDF) is the organisation which administers draughts throughout the world. It was created in 1947. In the French language it is called Fédération Mondiale du Jeu de Dames (FMJD). The WDF has organised the world draughts championships since 1948. == Other websites == *World Draughts Federation (WDF) Category:Draughts Category:1947 establishments Category:International sports organizations
title: World Draughts Federation
